name: Genpaku Rebirth
description:
Hey guys.

This game is made for "Indie Game Making Contest: Rebirth".

You can play it in browser but sound is a little off when I was testing it.

So preferred method to play is downloading it.

Game time is about 10 minutes. If you speedrun it then it take about 6 and if you talk with everybody then about 15.

I've made some simple scripts, and graphics but most of assets are default rpg maker mv resources.

It's made in RPG Maker MV.
